transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji boliye sir.
Customer: Good morning sir, main Ashwarya baat kar raha tha Indiamart.com se.
Executive: Ji boliye.
Customer: Friday baat ho rahi thi na aap se service vagarah ko leke.
Executive: Ji ji boliye sir.
Customer: To wo abhi us time to office ka time ho gaya tha to wo main group vagarah create nahi kar paya.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To main wo create karke na isko concern ko close karke aapko bhej raha hu.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Jo bhi koi aisi lead aati hai na jahan par ki badi quantity likha ho aur chota mangta hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To aisi lead bhi aap group me bhej diya karna so that ki main on the spot usko check karwa paun.
Executive: Okay okay, theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Could not create group due to office time.

- Wants to send leads with quantity discrepancies in group.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to send leads in group.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, group, quantity
